{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Squirtbottle |image = [[File:Squirtbottle.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Squirtbottle''. |dex = 0 (Bought at Goldenrod City in [[Johto]] for 5,000 {{farmpoints}}) |effect = Increases the chance of [[Berry|berry]] mutations }} The '''Squirtbottle''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the chance of [[Berry|mutations]] occurring in the [[Farm]]. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the [[Johto]] Berry Master in Goldenrod City. It also requires [[Farming Points]] to upgrade instead of Pokédollars. ==Details== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || +25% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 2,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |1 || +50% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 5,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |2 || +75% to mutation rate || 150 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 10,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |3 || +100% to mutation rate || 250 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 20,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |4 || +125% to mutation rate || 500 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |5/Max || +150% to mutation rate || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |} == Leveling Strategies == There are a few highly efficient strategies on how to level up the Squirtbottle based on which berries you have unlocked. To see the leveling Strategies, see the [[Farming Setups#Squirtbottle Leveling Strategies|Farming Setups page]]
